mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (memberIdx, payCode, lessonCnt, practiceCnt, payDate, lessonRmnCnt, practiceRmnCnt, memo, fees) VALUES( ${memberIdx}, ${payCode}, ${lessonCnt}, ${practiceCnt}, #{payDate}, ${lessonRmnCnt}, ${practiceRmnCnt}, #{memo}, ${fees} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE payment SET
memberIdx=#{memberIdx},
payCode=#{payCode},
lessonCnt=#{lessonCnt},
practiceCnt=#{practiceCnt},
payDate=#{payDate},
memo=#{memo},
usedRsvIdx=#{usedRsvIdx},
fees=#{fees},
isDelete=#{isDelete},
updateDate = now() WHERE payIdx=#{payIdx}

UPDATE payment SET
lessonRmnCnt=lessonRmnCnt+#{cnt},
practiceRmnCnt=practiceRmnCnt+#{cnt},
updateDate = now() WHERE memberIdx=#{memberIdx} ORDER by payDate DESC limit 1;
